content: create a festive and customizable christmas hat with this easy-to-follow crochet pattern this design is perfect for all ages and features a cozy ribbed brim a long tapered shape and a playful pom-pom to top it off the pattern includes instructions for multiple sizes from babies to adults and tips for personalizing the length and fit to suit your style why you ll love this pattern * works up quickly making it ideal for last-minute holiday projects * clear instructions make it perfect for beginners while still enjoyable for experienced crocheters * includes a full sizing chart - baby 0-3 months through adult l - so you can easily adjust for any head circumference * includes tips to avoid a traveling seam and achieve a professional look pdf crochet pattern includes - 8 page printable pdf english only - us terms - yarn amounts/quantities - yarn colours - stitch glossary - full written instruction for the hat - detalied sizing includes baby child teen and adult sizes
